page.title: 16COTTAGE HOSPITAL PENRITH.
page.content: A petition against closing the Cottage Hospital was signed by people all over England."How did they know about the Cottage Hospital?",you may well ask.Some people may have gone there for treatment or they may have relatives who may have been treated there.The council do not know what they will build there because in 1945 the Government bought all the privately-owned hospitals for the National Health Service. At the time of writing the future of the building is undecided. Ownership of the building is unclear. There is a list of public subscribers inside the front porch. The land on which the building stands was donated privately by Lowther Estates.
